author: Matt Stieb
title: Trump Wants Normalcy as Soon as Next Week, as Governors Prep for Longer Shutdown
description: To boost the economy, the president is mulling a near-return to normalcy as early as next week, while governors prepare for the coming reality.
content: Over the past week, the president has cycled between occasional flashes of competence and claims that have no basis in reality, like his Saturday boast that Ford and General Motors were making ventilators right now, which the automakers soon denied. After sev… [+3585 chars]
